overview: The film is about the journey of a group of people living together and trying to escape the pursuit of the undead to reach the last ferry at an isle on the lower Mekong when a zombie epidemic breaks out. Cong - a traditional medicine doctor but has lost faith in humanity, decided to take his father and daughter to find a way to leave. In the process of running away, they lost each other, Cong bewildered to find his daughter and accidentally met a gentle family, two magical boys, an honest young couple and a man with a brave heart. cold. Together, they join forces to form a fighting group to fight for life. At this time, the envy, greed, and selfishness of people's hearts arise and push them into life-or-death challenges. Where will the journey of this group of people go when the pandemic is spreading more and more?
title: Lost In Mekong Delta
